name: navy
content:
navy noun
(SEA FORCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ S, + sing/pl verb ] the part of a country's armed forces that is trained to operate at sea: My brother is an officer in the Navy. Gabriel joined the navy in 1997. a navy ship/vessel
More examplesFewer examplesThey both enlisted in the navy a year before the war broke out.My grandfather used to reminisce about his years in the navy.The navy plans to move its Tridents.The U.S. Navy entered combat in South Vietnam in 1964.The navy's largest ship was destroyed in the attack.
